homepage.meta.description.message: Thunderbird Add‑on: Jawa kɔfɛ ni piyɛs‑jɔntew orijiniw kɔnɔ

homepage.hero.subtitle.message: Ka jawa kɔfɛ Thunderbird kɔnɔ, k’a kɔ piyɛs‑jɔntew orijiniw la — ɔtomatikɔ walima kɔnfirimasiɔn dɔgɔya bɔ ma.

homepage.whatsNew.desc.message: Ka kalan cɛcɛliw kura minnu bɛ {changelog} kɔnɔ.

homepage.features.autoConfirm.body.message: Ka filan ɲɛ ni ɔtomatikɔ ɲɛsi walima kɔnfirimasiɔn jalogi dɔgɔya min b’a la rakkursiw klaviyɛri ɲɛ.

homepage.features.dedupe.body.message: A bɛ piyɛs‑jɔntew minnu bɛ kɔfɛ kɔrɔ dan na, a bɛ dublikiw tɛmɛ ni tɔgɔla la (filename), k’a ɲɛ ni k’a jɛman dɔ.

homepage.features.skipSmime.body.message: SMIME siɲɛturuw ni inline jɛlenuw bɛ tɛmɛ walasa ka jawaw dɔgɔya kɛ.

homepage.features.blacklist.body.message: Glob patɛrɛn minnu tɛ kan ka daminɛ (case‑insensitive), wɛrɛw fɛɛn bɛ {code1} walima {code2}, bɛ ka fayili sɔnsɔnw ma ɲɛsi.

homepage.search.tip.message: Talimaw: {slash} bɔ walima {ctrl}+{k} bɔ ka ɲini dokimɛnti kɔnɔ.

site.tagline.message: Thunderbird Add‑on: Jawa kɔfɛ ni piyɛs‑jɔntew orijiniw kɔnɔ
